column6: A : I guess all that kissing up paid off.(그렇게 아부하더니 효과가 있었던 것 같더라고.)
column7: B : You know Michael he's sucker for kissing up.(마이클 있잖아 그 아저씨는 아부에는 사족을 못 쓴다니까.)

column6: I'm sorry your wedding was called off Jack.(자네 결혼식이 취소돼서 유감이야 잭.)
column7: I guess Marin wasn't the right on for me.(머린은 나에게는 맞지 않는 여자였던 것 같아.)

column10: snd051_2_2_2_I guess Marin wasn't the right on for me

column6: Do you think it's for the best?(오히려 잘됐다고 생각하니?)
